verses.text: \w As|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* deer pants \w for|strong="H1121"\w* streams \w of|strong="H1121"\w* water, so my soul longs after You, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* thirsts \w for|strong="H5921"\w* God, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w living|strong="H5315"\w* God. \w When|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* come \w and|strong="H4325"\w* appear \w in|strong="H5921"\w* God’s \w presence|strong="H5921"\w*?\f + \fr 42:2 \ft Or and see the face of God?\f*

\w My|strong="H7200"\w* tears \w have|strong="H7200"\w* been \w my|strong="H7200"\w* food \w both|strong="H2416"\w* day \w and|strong="H6440"\w* night, \w while|strong="H7200"\w* \w men|strong="H5315"\w* ask \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H7200"\w* day \w long|strong="H4970"\w*, “Where \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* God?”

\w These|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* mind \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* pour \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* soul: how \w I|strong="H3117"\w* walked \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* multitude, leading \w the|strong="H3605"\w* procession \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* house \w of|strong="H3117"\w* God \w with|strong="H3117"\w* shouts \w of|strong="H3117"\w* joy \w and|strong="H3117"\w* praise.

\w Why|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* downcast, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*? \w Why|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* unease \w within|strong="H1004"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*? \w Put|strong="H5674"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* hope \w in|strong="H5921"\w* God, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w praise|strong="H8426"\w* \w Him|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* salvation \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w presence|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* despairs \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* remember \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Jordan \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* peaks \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Hermon— \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* Mount Mizar.

Deep calls \w to|strong="H5921"\w* deep \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* roar \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* waterfalls; \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* breakers \w and|strong="H2022"\w* waves \w have|strong="H2022"\w* rolled \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* decrees \w His|strong="H3605"\w* loving devotion \w by|strong="H5921"\w* day, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* night \w His|strong="H3605"\w* song \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* prayer \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* God \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w I|strong="H6680"\w* say \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* Rock, “Why \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H6680"\w* forgotten \w me|strong="H5973"\w*? Why must \w I|strong="H6680"\w* walk \w in|strong="H3068"\w* sorrow \w because|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* enemy’s oppression?”

\w Like|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* crushing \w of|strong="H5553"\w* \w my|strong="H7911"\w* bones, \w my|strong="H7911"\w* enemies taunt \w me|strong="H7911"\w*, while \w they|strong="H4100"\w* say \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w me|strong="H7911"\w* \w all|strong="H3212"\w* day \w long|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w Where|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H7911"\w* God?”

Why \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* downcast, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* soul? Why \w the|strong="H3605"\w* unease within \w me|strong="H3117"\w*? Put \w your|strong="H3605"\w* hope \w in|strong="H3117"\w* God, \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w yet|strong="H3605"\w* praise \w Him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* Savior \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* God.
